medical_history.chief_complaint: RUQ/epigastric pain after eating a burrito.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has had a two year history of intermittent RUQ pain after eating fatty meals. After changing her diet, she did not have an attack until today, when she developed constant RUQ/epigastric pain that felt 'like a kick in the stomach' after eating a burrito. The pain was similar to prior episodes and resolved after a few hours without pain medication.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD), Focal Nodular Hyperplasia (FNH), cholelithiasis.
